mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, PGDH, BB, LYLX, LYSM, JSWJID, GLPGDID, JX, PGQX, ZJH, PGDZT, SXYQ, BZ, ZXBS, F_BBID, B_BBID, ZT, PGBMID, PGRID, PGSJ, SHBMID, SHRID, SHSJ, SHYJ, PFBMID, PFRID, PFSJ, PFYJ, GBRID, GBRQ, GBYY, PFJL, SHJL,YJBFZLSJ,yjbfzl
mapper.select: SELECT b1.id,b1.DPRTCODE,b1.PGDH,b1.BB,b1.PGSJ,b1.zt FROM b_g2_001 B1 JOIN b_g2_001 B2 ON B1.pgdh = B2.pgdh WHERE B2.ID = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B1.DPRTCODE = #{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY B1.BB DESC
select zt from B_G2_001 where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from B_G2_001 where PGDH=#{pgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bb=#{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select
from B_G2_001 where jswjid = #{jswjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LYLX=1

select B_G2_001.id,B_G2_001.jx,B_G2_001.pgrid,B_G2_001.pgdh,B_G2_001.zt,B_G2_001.bb, B_G2_00101.zlxl, pgr.realname pgr_realname,pgr.username pgr_username from B_G2_001 left join t_user pgr on B_G2_001.pgrid=pgr.id left join B_G2_00101 on B_G2_00101.mainid=B_G2_001.id where B_G2_001.jswjid = #{jswjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and B_G2_001.LYLX=1 order by B_G2_001.jx,B_G2_00101.zlxl asc
mapper.update:
UPDATE B_G2_001 SET SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = 3, SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHSJ = sysdate, SHJL=3 WHERE ID IN
#{id}

UPDATE B_G2_001 SET PFRID = #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFBMID = #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = 4, PFYJ = #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PFSJ = sysdate, PFJL=4 WHERE ID IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT B1.ID,B1.DPRTCODE,B1.PGDH,B1.BB,B1.LYLX,B1.LYSM,B1.JSWJID,B1.GLPGDID,B1.JX,B1.PGQX,B1.ZJH,B1.PGDZT,B1.SXYQ,B1.BZ,B1.ZXBS, B1.F_BBID,B1.B_BBID,B1.ZT,B1.PGBMID,B1.PGRID,B1.PGSJ,B1.SHBMID,B1.SHRID,B1.SHSJ,B1.SHYJ,B1.PFBMID,B1.PFRID,B1.PFSJ,B1.PFYJ, B1.GBRID,B1.GBRQ,B1.GBYY,B1.PFJL,B1.SHJL,B2.MAINID, B2.ID AS TECHNICALATTACHED_ID,B2.WCLX,B2.DJ,B2.JJCD,B2.SJGZ,B2.WJZY,B2.SYFW_YWJ,B2.SYX,B2.FSYYY,B2.SYLB,B2.SYFW_BDW,B1.YJBFZLSJ,B1.YJBFZL,B2.GBTJ,B2.IS_CFJC, B2.IS_ZZCS,B2.IS_MFHC,B2.IS_ZBHC,B2.IS_TSGJ,B2.IS_YXZLPH,B2.YWJNR,B2.BJ,B2.WJGXJX,B2.XGWJZXZTDC,B2.GCPGJL,B2.JLFJID,b2.fjzch, B3.JSWJLX,B3.JSWJBH,B3.JSWJZT,B3.BB AS A_BB,B3.ID AIRWORTHINESS_ID,B3.GLJSWJID,B3.SXRQ,B3.XZAH,B3.JSWJLY,B3.JSWJLX,B3.ZDSJ,B3.BFRQ,B3.DQRQ, B4.USERNAME || ' ' || B4.REALNAME AS PGR_ID, CEIL(B1.PGQX - SYSDATE) AS SYTS, D011.ATTACHCOUNT, B5.DPRTNAME AS JG_DPRTNAME, B6.ZJH || ' ' ||B6.YWMS AS ZJH_ZJH, B7.PGDH AS GLPGDH, B8.WBWJM, B9.JSWJBH AS GLJSWJBH,B9.ID AS GLGLJSWJID,B9.id AS GLJSWJID, B10.USERNAME || ' ' || B10.REALNAME AS SHR_ID, B11.USERNAME || ' ' || B11.REALNAME AS PZR_ID, B12.ID OLDID,B12.BB OLDBB, B13.WBWJM SCFJ_WBWJM,B13.ID SID,B13.HZM SCFJ_HZM, B14.WBWJM JSWJ_WBWJM,B14.ID JSWJ_ID,B14.HZM JSWJ_HZM, bg200102.id SYX_id,bg200102.xc SYX_XC,bg200102.bh SYX_BH,bg200102.xlh SYX_XLH,bg200102.szwz SYX_SZWZ,bg200102.whdwid SYX_WHDWID ,D008.XINGH AS SYX_XINGH
FROM B_G2_001 B1 LEFT JOIN B_G2_00100 B2 ON B1.ID = B2.MAINID LEFT JOIN B_G2_000 B3 ON B1.JSWJID = B3.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER B4 ON B1.PGRID=B4.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAINID,COUNT(1) AS ATTACHCOUNT FROM D_011 WHERE YXZT=1 GROUP BY MAINID) D011 ON D011.MAINID = B1.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT B5 ON B1.DPRTCODE=B5.ID LEFT JOIN D_005 B6 ON B1.ZJH =B6.ZJH AND B1.DPRTCODE=B6.DPRTCODE LEFT JOIN B_G2_001 B7 ON B1.GLPGDID= B7.ID LEFT JOIN D_011 B8 ON B2.MAINID=B8.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_000 B9 ON B9.ID=B7.JSWJID LEFT JOIN T_USER B10 ON B1.SHRID=B10.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER B11 ON B1.PFRID=B11.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_001 B12 ON B1.F_BBID=B12.ID LEFT JOIN D_011 B13 ON B2.JLFJID=B13.MAINID AND B13.YXZT=1 LEFT JOIN D_011 B14 ON B1.JSWJID=B14.MAINID AND B14.YXZT=1 LEFT JOIN b_g2_00102 bg200102 ON bg200102.MAINID = B1.ID and bg200102.kjbs=1 LEFT JOIN D_008 D008 ON bg200102.BH = D008.BJH AND B1.DPRTCODE = D008.DPRTCODE WHERE B1.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT bb FROM (SELECT bb FROM B_G2_001 WHERE pgdh = #{ pgdh, jdbcType = VARCHAR } and dprtcode = #{ dprtcode, jdbcType = VARCHAR } ORDER BY BB DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update B_G2_001
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PGDH = #{pgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BB = #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LYLX = #{lylx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LYSM = #{lysm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSWJID = #{jswjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GLPGDID = #{glpgdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PGQX = #{pgqx,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZJH = #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PGDZT = #{pgdzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXYQ = #{sxyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
F_BBID = #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PGBMID = #{pgbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PGRID = #{pgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PGSJ = sysdate,
SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHSJ = sysdate,
SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFBMID = #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFRID = #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFSJ = sysdate,
PFYJ = #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBRID = #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBRQ = sysdate,
GBYY = #{gbyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFJL = #{pfjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHJL = #{shjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YJBFZLSJ = #{yjbfzlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
YJBFZL = #{yjbfzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select b1.ID,b1.DPRTCODE,b1.PGDH,b1.BB,b1.LYLX,b1.LYSM,b1.JSWJID,b1.GLPGDID,b1.JX,b1.PGQX,b1.ZJH,b1.PGDZT,b1.SXYQ,b1.BZ,b1.ZXBS, b1.F_BBID,b1.B_BBID,b1.ZT,b1.PGBMID,b1.PGRID,b1.PGSJ,b1.SHBMID,b1.SHRID,b1.SHSJ,b1.SHYJ,b1.PFBMID,b1.PFRID,b1.PFSJ,b1.PFYJ, b1.GBRID,b1.GBRQ,b1.GBYY,b1.PFJL,b1.SHJL,b4.jswjlx, b4.JSWJBH,b4.bfrq,b4.sxrq,b4.dqrq,b4.bb a_bb,t.username PGR_USERUSER,t.realname PGR_REALNAME from b_g2_001 b1 left join b_g2_00101 b5 on B1.id=B5.MAINID
left join b_g_003 b3 on b1.id=b3.pgdid and b1.dprtcode =b3.dprtcode
left join b_g2_000 b4 on b1.jswjid = b4.id and b4.zt=1 left join t_user t on b1.pgrid=t.id
